name: Biodigital
developer: Takahito Ito, Cesar Hidalgo, et al.
publisher: Collective Learning group, The MIT Media Lab, NHK
description: Experience the singularity in this fictional story set in the year 2117. Biodigital tells the story of how humans decided to download their minds into machines.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: i5 Memory: 8000 MB RAM Graphics: 1050 Storage: 5000 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: i7 Memory: 16000 MB RAM Graphics: 1080 GTX Storage: 5000 MB available space
